short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Create and manage Whatsapp, telegram, viber, Sms, voice Groups in a single click. Share customizable messages for all your contact

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Create and manage WhatsApp, Telegram, Viber, SMS, voice groups with one click. Share one or more customizable messages (multiple videos, images, text, and documents) and your contact.


- Send one or more messages
- Target phone number database for your business
- Export of phone numbers from WA groups and contact .
- Export phone number from Telegram groups by ID or username (PRO option)
- Addon option for your WhatsApp web  and provide Telegram soon.
- and ...
